footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Childe | Update Date: 10/07/2022 | Editor: ~Z~#0009

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Polar Star__
Best overall for a main DPS build as the effect is easy to keep up with Childe on the field.

__Aqua Simulacra__ 
Best overall for a burst DPS build as you don't need to fulfill any conditions to keep the effect active

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Thundering Pulse, Skyward Harp__ 
These weapons are comparable to Polar Star and Aqua to the point that using any of them is valid instead of pulling for 1 specifically.

__Viridescent Hunt__
Best 4 star option and easy to get with battle pass. Effect helps grouping and the main stat helps your Crit Rate needs.

__Blackcliff, Mouun's Moon, Prototype Crescent, Rust, Stringless__
Alternative F2P options depending on what you have available. Dmg is comparable between these.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%  |<goblet>  Hydro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: CRIT Rate|CRIT DMG|ATK% | EM | ER (to an extent)

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Foul Legacy - Raging Tide
**2)** Elemental Burst: Havoc - Obliteration
**3)** Normal Attack: Cutting Torrent

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Childe's Talents:
Burst and Skill contribute roughly the same amount of damage in the main DPS rotation, so both should be levelled equally. If built as a Burst DPS then obviously Burst should be the primary talent. If you plan to use Childe on-field during his downtime you will also want to level his Normals to help his Charged Shot dmg. 

Childe's Artifacts:
You can use 4 piece Heart of Depth, 2 piece HoD with Atk% or Noblesse, or 4 piece Shimenawa's as they are roughly the same dmg output although Shimenawa will have a higher ER requirement to comfortably cycle.
